text: Lucien Pellat-Finet is a French designer. He specialise in cashmere and started with knitted luxurious sweaters. Intarsia knitters from Edinburgh are used to knit the sweaters since the area is known for producing high-end cashmere. The label has a store in London and in New York. == References == Category:French fashion designers
title: Lucien Pellat-Finet
